title: Maouhoub Ghazouani
text: Maouhoub Ghazouani (born 1946) is a <a href="Moroccan%20people">Moroccan</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> who played for <a href="Morocco%20national%20football%20team">Morocco</a> in the <a href="1970%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1970 FIFA World Cup</a>. He scored a goal versus <a href="Bulgaria%20national%20football%20team">Bulgaria</a> in a 1-1 draw. Morocco therefore became the first African side to avoid defeat in the World Cup. He also played for <a href="FAR%20Rabat">FAR Rabat</a>.
